data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 2,178 believers in Chai Nat, Thailand a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chai Nat, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 336,900 people living in Chai Nat.

data.section_summary: On average, 29 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Chai Nat, Thailand.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Chai Nat, Thailand that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Chai Nat.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Ugong people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, grace the churches in Chai Nat, Thailand with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Chai Nat, Thailand a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Chai Nat, Thailand.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

location.name: Chai Nat
location.cities_list: Chai Nat, Nong Mamong, Noen Kham, Sapphaya, Sankhaburi
location.cities_list_w_pop: Chai Nat (15,469), Nong Mamong, Noen Kham, Sapphaya, Sankhaburi
